channel.title: "Admin Command Prompt Here" Registry Hack
channel.description: A neat (if not well known) feature of Windows Vista is the built in ability to do a "Command Prompt Here" by selecting a folder, keeping the shift key down and right clicking on the folder.  While this is...
channel.dc:creator: Martin
